name: Cthulhu Of Duty
description:
Made for the GMC Jam 46.

In 1942, the Manhattan Project went into more... interesting paths.

In their secret labs, America managed to summon a shard of an entity codenamed GOLD JULY BOOJUM.

The United States Armed Forces formally conscripts this entity in the fight against the menace in Europe.

You are Pvt. GOLD JULY BOOJUM.

You embark on the shores of Normandy on June 6, 1944 as the Allies' secret weapon.

But they might regret calling you for help....

This is a very early build! It is still very much unfinished, but it is "playable" as far as the main game loop is concerned.

There will be a post-jam full version, hopefully.

WASD to move

Left-click to shoot if weapon is equipped.

In the current build, you can crush soldiers and take apart a tank and use its turret as a rifle.

Start as a smol Cthulhu, eat souls, and grow to a giant Cthulhu.

10 souls to humanoid Cthulhu

50 souls to large Cthulhu

250 souls to giant Cthulhu
